reviewText:
Fun little game that is very reasonably priced.

+Nice cartoon graphics
+Good controls
+Good gadgets to upgrade
+Lots of short levels, well over 100 counting bonus levels.
-A bit too easy, probably made to appeal to all ages.
-Main downside is that some things are a bit too scripted making it very linear, thus the ony way to go about things and less replay value.

Realistically you will probably get 5 hours out of the game. It reminds me of Level 22 (guy who is running late for work and must sneak into work) but Robbery Bob is better imo. Haven't used vents, but hide in bushes, under carpets, set off alarms, disguises and more. It also has a few aspects of the Marvelous Mistake. Its a nice basic stealth game, I hope to see more fun games like this and even some more serious stealth robber games too such as Crookz the Heist.

I can't believe with all the stealth games I search for this was not auto-reccomened by Steam (update maybe because stealth was not in the tags for some reason, I added it), I had to search robber to get some more stealth games in my searches.
